slow_internet.solution: Try restarting your router and checking your connection settings.

app_crashing.symptom: The app keeps crashing on startup
app_crashing.solution: Update the app to the latest version and restart your device.

computer_freezing.solution: Check for overheating, close unnecessary programs, and restart your computer.

wifi_not_connecting.solution: Forget and reconnect to the network, or restart your network adapter.

battery_draining.solution: Close background apps, reduce screen brightness, and check battery health.
